name: Vena
description:
You are traveling inside an artery eating as much sugar as possible. 

Each time you eat you get bigger and then your problem begins. Keep flying to return to your normal size.

 Try to travel as far as you can and score as much as possible while avoiding iron cells blocking your way.

Play on the go, play at home. Buying this Android game you get a PC version as a bonus! 

FEATURING: 

. Clear crisp minimalist and colorful graphics ;

. Unobtrusive menus, jump fast into action ;

. Highly replayable skill-based gameplay ;

. Very simple controls;

. Endless score-based gameplay challenge!
